# ggsci

ggsci offers a collection of ggplot2 color palettes inspired by
scientific journals, data visualization libraries, science fiction
movies, and TV shows.

## Installation

You can install ggsci from CRAN:

``` r
install.packages("ggsci")
```

Or try the development version on GitHub:

``` r
remotes::install_github("nanxstats/ggsci")
```

[Browse the vignette](https://nanx.me/ggsci/articles/ggsci.html) (or
open with [`vignette("ggsci")`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/articles/ggsci.md)
in R) for a quick-start guide.

## Contribute

To contribute to this project, please take a look at the [Contributing
Guidelines](https://nanx.me/ggsci/CONTRIBUTING.html) first. Please note
that the ggsci project is released with a [Contributor Code of
Conduct](https://nanx.me/ggsci/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.html). By contributing to
this project, you agree to abide by its terms.

# Package index

## NPG

- [`pal_npg()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_npg.md) : NPG
  journal color palettes
- [`scale_color_npg()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_npg.md)
  [`scale_colour_npg()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_npg.md)
  [`scale_fill_npg()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_npg.md) :
  NPG journal color scales

## AAAS

- [`pal_aaas()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_aaas.md) : AAAS
  journal color palettes
- [`scale_color_aaas()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_aaas.md)
  [`scale_colour_aaas()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_aaas.md)
  [`scale_fill_aaas()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_aaas.md) :
  AAAS journal color scales

## NEJM

- [`pal_nejm()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_nejm.md) : NEJM
  color palettes
- [`scale_color_nejm()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_nejm.md)
  [`scale_colour_nejm()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_nejm.md)
  [`scale_fill_nejm()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_nejm.md) :
  NEJM color scales

## Lancet

- [`pal_lancet()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_lancet.md) :
  Lancet journal color palettes
- [`scale_color_lancet()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_lancet.md)
  [`scale_colour_lancet()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_lancet.md)
  [`scale_fill_lancet()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_lancet.md)
  : Lancet journal color scales

## JAMA

- [`pal_jama()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_jama.md) : Journal
  of the American Medical Association color palettes
- [`scale_color_jama()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_jama.md)
  [`scale_colour_jama()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_jama.md)
  [`scale_fill_jama()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_jama.md) :
  Journal of the American Medical Association color scales

## BMJ

- [`pal_bmj()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_bmj.md) : BMJ color
  palettes
- [`scale_color_bmj()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_bmj.md)
  [`scale_colour_bmj()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_bmj.md)
  [`scale_fill_bmj()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_bmj.md) :
  BMJ color scales

## JCO

- [`pal_jco()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_jco.md) : Journal of
  Clinical Oncology color palettes
- [`scale_color_jco()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_jco.md)
  [`scale_colour_jco()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_jco.md)
  [`scale_fill_jco()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_jco.md) :
  Journal of Clinical Oncology color scales

## UCSCGB

- [`pal_ucscgb()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_ucscgb.md) : UCSC
  Genome Browser color palette
- [`scale_color_ucscgb()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_ucscgb.md)
  [`scale_colour_ucscgb()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_ucscgb.md)
  [`scale_fill_ucscgb()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_ucscgb.md)
  : UCSC Genome Browser color scales

## D3

- [`pal_d3()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_d3.md) : D3.js color
  palettes
- [`scale_color_d3()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_d3.md)
  [`scale_colour_d3()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_d3.md)
  [`scale_fill_d3()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_d3.md) :
  D3.js color scales

## Observable

- [`pal_observable()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_observable.md)
  : Observable 10 color palette
- [`scale_color_observable()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_observable.md)
  [`scale_colour_observable()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_observable.md)
  [`scale_fill_observable()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_observable.md)
  : Observable 10 color scales

## Primer

- [`pal_primer()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_primer.md) :
  Primer design system palette
- [`scale_color_primer()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_primer.md)
  [`scale_colour_primer()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_primer.md)
  [`scale_fill_primer()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_primer.md)
  : Primer color scales

## Atlassian

- [`pal_atlassian()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_atlassian.md)
  : Atlassian Design System palette
- [`scale_color_atlassian()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_atlassian.md)
  [`scale_colour_atlassian()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_atlassian.md)
  [`scale_fill_atlassian()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_atlassian.md)
  : Atlassian Design System color scales

## iTerm

- [`iterm_palettes()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/iterm_palettes.md)
  : iTerm color palette names
- [`pal_iterm()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_iterm.md) : iTerm
  color palettes
- [`scale_color_iterm()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_iterm.md)
  [`scale_colour_iterm()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_iterm.md)
  [`scale_fill_iterm()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_iterm.md)
  : iTerm color scales

## LocusZoom

- [`pal_locuszoom()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_locuszoom.md)
  : LocusZoom color palette
- [`scale_color_locuszoom()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_locuszoom.md)
  [`scale_colour_locuszoom()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_locuszoom.md)
  [`scale_fill_locuszoom()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_locuszoom.md)
  : LocusZoom color scales

## IGV

- [`pal_igv()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_igv.md) :
  Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV) color palettes
- [`scale_color_igv()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_igv.md)
  [`scale_colour_igv()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_igv.md)
  [`scale_fill_igv()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_igv.md) :
  Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV) color scales

## COSMIC

- [`pal_cosmic()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_cosmic.md) :
  COSMIC color palettes
- [`scale_color_cosmic()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_cosmic.md)
  [`scale_colour_cosmic()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_cosmic.md)
  [`scale_fill_cosmic()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_cosmic.md)
  : COSMIC color scales

## UChicago

- [`pal_uchicago()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_uchicago.md) :
  The University of Chicago color palettes
- [`scale_color_uchicago()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_uchicago.md)
  [`scale_colour_uchicago()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_uchicago.md)
  [`scale_fill_uchicago()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_uchicago.md)
  : The University of Chicago color scales

- [`pal_startrek()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_startrek.md) :

- [`scale_color_startrek()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_startrek.md)
  [`scale_colour_startrek()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_startrek.md)
  [`scale_fill_startrek()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_startrek.md)

- [`pal_tron()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_tron.md) : Tron

- [`scale_color_tron()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_tron.md)
  [`scale_colour_tron()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_tron.md)
  [`scale_fill_tron()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_tron.md) :
  Tron Legacy color scales

- [`pal_futurama()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_futurama.md) :

  [`scale_colour_simpsons()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_simpsons.md)
  [`scale_fill_simpsons()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_simpsons.md)
  : The Simpsons color scales

## Flat UI

- [`pal_flatui()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_flatui.md) : Flat
  UI color palettes
- [`scale_color_flatui()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_flatui.md)
  [`scale_colour_flatui()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_flatui.md)
  [`scale_fill_flatui()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_flatui.md)
  : Flat UI color scales

## Frontiers

- [`pal_frontiers()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_frontiers.md)
  : Frontiers journal color palettes
- [`scale_color_frontiers()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_frontiers.md)
  [`scale_colour_frontiers()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_frontiers.md)
  [`scale_fill_frontiers()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_frontiers.md)
  : Frontiers journal color scales

## GSEA

- [`rgb_gsea()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/rgb_gsea.md) : The GSEA
  GenePattern color palettes
- [`pal_gsea()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_gsea.md) : The GSEA
  GenePattern color palettes
- [`scale_color_gsea()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_gsea.md)
  [`scale_colour_gsea()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_gsea.md)
  [`scale_fill_gsea()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_gsea.md) :
  The GSEA GenePattern color scales

## Bootstrap 5

- [`rgb_bs5()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/rgb_bs5.md) : Bootstrap
  5 color palettes
- [`pal_bs5()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_bs5.md) : Bootstrap
  5 color palettes
- [`scale_color_bs5()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_bs5.md)
  [`scale_colour_bs5()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_bs5.md)
  [`scale_fill_bs5()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_bs5.md) :
  Bootstrap 5 color scales

## Material Design

- [`rgb_material()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/rgb_material.md) :
  Material Design color palettes
- [`pal_material()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_material.md) :
  Material Design color palettes
- [`scale_color_material()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_material.md)
  [`scale_colour_material()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_material.md)
  [`scale_fill_material()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_material.md)
  : Material Design color scales

## Tailwind CSS

- [`rgb_tw3()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/rgb_tw3.md) : Tailwind
  CSS color palettes
- [`pal_tw3()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/pal_tw3.md) : Tailwind
  CSS color palettes
- [`scale_color_tw3()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_tw3.md)
  [`scale_colour_tw3()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_tw3.md)
  [`scale_fill_tw3()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/scale_tw3.md) :
  Tailwind CSS color scales

## Example plots

- [`example_scatterplot()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/example_plots.md)
  [`example_barplot()`](https://nanx.me/ggsci/reference/example_plots.md)
  : Example plots for discrete color palettes

### All vignettes

- [Frequently Asked Questions about
  ggsci](https://nanx.me/ggsci/articles/ggsci-faq.md):

  ggplot2](https://nanx.me/ggsci/articles/ggsci.md):
